comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: A nice small collection here of the men involved in the Battles of Coronel and Falkland Islands.  Admiral Sturdee led the British squadron charged with hunting down von Spee's armoured cruisers using the battle cruisers Jackie Fisher designed for just such tasks.  He may be pictured here on board on of them (HMS Invincible or Inflexible)

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: The Washington herald., December 12, 1914, Page 1 chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn83045433/1914-12-12/ed-... looks to have used this picture together with the one of Von Spee that is in this batch. And Warren sheaf., December 23, 1914, page 1 (Warren, Minnesota) chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn90059228/1914-12-23/ed-... used the same two pictures.

comment.author: 34911459@N08
comment._content: artalog: Thanks for the full name of Adm. Sturdee.  We will update the data to include his full name.
